verses.roman:
sabhājito bhagavatā
kṛtāsana-parigrahaḥ
tasmai tad varṇayām āsa
nārāyaṇa-mukhāc chrutam

synonyms: sabhājitaḥ—honored; bhagavatā—by the personal expansion of the Supreme Lord (Vyāsadeva); kṛta—having done; āsana—of a seat; parigrahaḥ—the acceptance; tasmai—to him; tat—that; varṇayām āsa—he described; nārāyaṇa-mukhāt—from the mouth of Śrī Nārāyaṇa Ṛṣi; śrutam—what he had heard.
translation: Vyāsadeva, the incarnation of the Personality of Godhead, respectfully greeted Nārada Muni and offered him a seat, which he accepted. Nārada then described to Vyāsa what he had heard from the mouth of Śrī Nārāyaṇa Ṛṣi.
